alert.note: Alert for Eastern Bergen; Eastern Essex; Eastern Passaic; Eastern Union; Western Bergen; Western Essex; Western Union (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 04 at 12:31PM EST until February 04 at 7:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mainly freezing rain, possibly mixing with sleet. Additional ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. Little or no sleet accumulation. * WHERE...Portions of northeast New Jersey and southeast New York. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Transition to freezing rain will be gradual from north to south this afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Bergen; Eastern Essex; Eastern Passaic; Eastern Union; Western Bergen; Western Essex; Western Union
